00026 #define DETAIL_TILE_CACHE_SIZE                  4096
00027 
00029 #define DETAIL_TILE_BUMP_SIZE                   2048
00030 #define DETAIL_TILE_DIFFUSE_SIZE                4096
00031 #define DETAIL_TILE_SPECULAR_SIZE               4096
00032 #define DETAIL_TILE_SIZE                                10240
00033 
00035 #define DETAIL_ATLAS_WIDTH                              ( GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TEXELS / GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY )
00036 #define DETAIL_ATLAS_HEIGHT                             ( GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TEXELS / GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY )
00037 
00038 #define DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_PEL_SIZE               ( 2 )
00039 #define DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_WIDTH                  ( GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TEXELS / GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY * DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_PEL_SIZE )
00040 #define DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_HEIGHT                 ( GR_UBERTEX_SIZE_IN_TEXELS / GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY )
00041 #define DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_SIZE                   ( DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_WIDTH * DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_HEIGHT )
00042 
00043 #define DETAIL_ATLAS_ADDR( ptr, x, y )  ( ptr + y * DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_WIDTH + x * DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_PEL_SIZE )
00044 
00046 #define TILE_BUMP_OFFSET( ptr )                 ( ( unsigned char* )ptr +    0 )
00047 #define TILE_DIFFUSE_OFFSET( ptr )              ( ( unsigned char* )ptr + 2048 )
00048 #define TILE_SPECULAR_OFFSET( ptr )             ( ( unsigned char* )ptr + 6144 )
00049 
00051 #define LOWRES_TEXTURE_WIDTH                    2048
00052 #define LOWRES_TEXTURE_HEIGHT                   2048

00062 //----------------------------------------------------------
00063 GrUberTexture::GrUberTexture( const UPath& filePath )
00064 : _fileAtlas( 0 )
00065 , _tileCache( DETAIL_TILE_CACHE_SIZE )
00066 , _tileLocks( 0 )
00067 {
00069         const unsigned int kOpenFlags = RFileMgr::kFlagRead |
00070                                                                         RFileMgr::kFlagWrite |
00071                                                                         RFileMgr::kFlagDMA;
00072 
00074         _file = gRFileMgr->GetFile( filePath, kOpenFlags );
00075 
00077         _fileAtlas = gGrUTLoader->LoadUbertex( _file->GetHandle() );
00078 
00080         Init();
00081 
00083 }

00085 //----------------------------------------------------------
00086 GrUberTexture::GrUberTexture( const UPath& filePath, const void* tileUsageBitmap, const char* metaData,
00087                                                           unsigned int metaDataSize )
00088 : _fileAtlas( 0 )
00089 , _tileCache( DETAIL_TILE_CACHE_SIZE )
00090 , _tileLocks( 0 )
00091 {
00093         const unsigned int kCreateFlags =       RFileMgr::kFlagCreateAlways |
00094                                                                                 RFileMgr::kFlagRead |
00095                                                                                 RFileMgr::kFlagWrite |
00096                                                                                 RFileMgr::kFlagDMA;
00097 
00099         _file = gRFileMgr->GetFile( filePath, kCreateFlags );
00100 
00102         _fileAtlas = gGrUTLoader->CreateUbertex( _file->GetHandle(), tileUsageBitmap, metaData,
00103                 metaDataSize, 0 );
00104 
00106         Init();
00107 
00109 }

00111 //----------------------------------------------------------
00112 GrUberTexture::~GrUberTexture()
00113 {
00115 
00117         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 7; ++i )
00118                 AlignedFree( _detailTileUsage[ i ] );
00119 
00121         gGrUTLoader->FreeAtlas( _fileAtlas );
00122 
00124         unsigned char* mem = ( unsigned char* )~0;
00125         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < DETAIL_TILE_CACHE_SIZE; ++i )
00126         {
00127                 void* cur = _tileCache.GetOldest();
00128                 STileData& tile = _tileCache.GetValue( cur );
00129                 WaitLockFree( tile.lock );
00130                 mem = Min( mem, ( unsigned char* )tile.data );
00131                 _tileCache.Remove( cur );
00132         }
00133 
00135         delete[] _tileLocks;
00136 
00138         AlignedFree( mem );
00139 }

00146 //----------------------------------------------------------
00147 void
00148 GrUberTexture::CacheDetailTiles( unsigned int startMip, unsigned int x, unsigned int y,
00149                                                                  unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00150                                                                  unsigned int clipMinX, unsigned int clipMinY,
00151                                                                  unsigned int clipMaxX, unsigned int clipMaxY )
00152 {
00154         B_ASSERT( width <= 16 && height <= 16 );
00155         B_ASSERT( startMip < 4 );
00156 
00158         unsigned int cacheTileX = 0;
00159         unsigned int cacheTileY = 0;
00160         if ( !gGrUberDetailCache->ReserveRegion( cacheTileX, cacheTileY, width, height ) )
00161                 return;
00162 
00164         WriteAtlas( x, y, width, height, ( unsigned char )cacheTileX, ( unsigned char )cacheTileY );
00165 
00167         for ( unsigned int mip = startMip; mip < 4; ++mip )
00168         {
00170                 unsigned int curX = x >> mip;
00171                 unsigned int curY = y >> mip;
00172                 unsigned int endX = curX + width;
00173                 unsigned int endY = curY + height;
00174 
00176                 curX = Max( curX, clipMinX >> mip );
00177                 curY = Max( curY, clipMinY >> mip );
00178                 endX = Min( endX, clipMaxX >> mip );
00179                 endY = Min( endY, clipMaxY >> mip );
00180 
00182                 STileKey tileKey;
00183                 tileKey.bits.mip = mip;
00184                 for ( unsigned int localY = 0; curY < endY; ++curY, ++localY )
00185                 {
00186                         for ( unsigned int localX = 0; curX < endX; ++curX, ++localX )
00187                         {
00189                                 tileKey.bits.x = curX;
00190                                 tileKey.bits.y = curY;
00191                                 void* tileIter = _tileCache.Find( tileKey.hash, tileKey );
00192                                 if ( tileIter )
00193                                 {
00195                                         STileData& tileData = _tileCache.GetValue( tileIter );
00196                                         if ( IsLockFree( tileData.lock ) )
00197                                         {
00199                                                 gGrUberDetailCache->UploadTile( mip, cacheTileX + localX, cacheTileY + localY,
00200                                                         TILE_BUMP_OFFSET( tileData.data ), TILE_DIFFUSE_OFFSET( tileData.data ),
00201                                                         TILE_SPECULAR_OFFSET( tileData.data ) );
00202                                         }
00203                                 }
00204                                 else
00205                                 {
00207                                         unsigned int chunk = _fileAtlas->FindTileChunk( mip, curX, curY );
00208                                         if ( chunk == 0 )
00209                                                 continue;
00210 
00212                                         void* oldestIter = _tileCache.GetOldest();
00213                                         STileData& tileData = _tileCache.GetValue( oldestIter );
00214 
00216                                         WaitLockFree( tileData.lock );
00217 
00219                                         gGrUTLoader->DecodeChunk( tileData.data, tileData.lock, _file->GetHandle(), chunk );
00220 
00222                                         _tileCache.Insert( tileKey.hash, tileKey, tileData );
00223                                 }
00224                         }
00225                 }
00226         }
00227 }

00230 void
00231 GrUberTexture::BindLowResTextures( unsigned int bumpSampler, unsigned int diffuseSampler,
00232                                                                    unsigned int specularSampler )
00233 {
00235         _lowResBump->Bind( bumpSampler );
00236         _lowResDiffuse->Bind( diffuseSampler );
00237         _lowResSpecular->Bind( specularSampler );
00238 }

00240 //----------------------------------------------------------
00241 void
00242 GrUberTexture::ResetAtlas()
00243 {
00245         unsigned int atlasEraseCount = _atlasEraseCount;
00246 
00248         if ( atlasEraseCount <= MAX_ATLAS_WRITES )
00249         {
00250                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < atlasEraseCount; ++i )
00251                 {
00252                         SAtlasErase& erase = _atlasEraseQueue[ i ];
00253                         for ( unsigned int y = erase.y; y < erase.endY; ++y )
00254                         {
00255                                 unsigned int* curPel = ( unsigned int* )DETAIL_ATLAS_ADDR( _detailAtlasMem, erase.x, y );
00256                                 for ( unsigned int x = erase.x; x < erase.endX; ++x, ++curPel )
00257                                         *curPel = 0xFFFFFFFF;
00258                         }
00259                 }
00260         }
00261         else
00262         {
00264                 MemSet( _detailAtlasMem, 0xFF, DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_SIZE );
00265         }
00266 }

00273 //----------------------------------------------------------
00274 void
00275 GrUberTexture::Init()
00276 {
00279         STileKey key;
00280         key.bits.mip = ~0;
00281 
00283         _tileLocks = new int[ DETAIL_TILE_CACHE_SIZE ];
00284 
00286         unsigned char* tileMem = ( unsigned char* )AlignedAlloc( 2048, DETAIL_TILE_CACHE_SIZE * DETAIL_TILE_SIZE );
00287         STileData tileData;
00288         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < DETAIL_TILE_CACHE_SIZE; ++i, tileMem += DETAIL_TILE_SIZE )
00289         {
00291                 key.bits.x = i & 2043;
00292                 key.bits.y = i >> 11;
00293 
00295                 tileData.data = tileMem;
00296                 tileData.lock = InitLock( _tileLocks + i );
00297 
00299                 _tileCache.Insert( key.hash, key, tileData );
00300         }
00301 
00303         _atlasEraseCount = 0;
00304         _detailAtlasMem = new unsigned char[ DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_SIZE ];
00305         MemSet( _detailAtlasMem, 0xFF, DETAIL_ATLAS_MEM_SIZE );
00306 
00308         unsigned int kTexFlags = GrTextureBase::kNoCompress | GrTextureBase::kNoMipMap;
00309         _lowResBump = ( GrTexture* )( GrTextureBase* )gGrTextureMgr->GetEmptyTexture( "lowres_bump",
00310                 LOWRES_TEXTURE_WIDTH, LOWRES_TEXTURE_HEIGHT, GrTextureBase::EF_DXT5R, kTexFlags, false );
00311         _lowResDiffuse = ( GrTexture* )( GrTextureBase* )gGrTextureMgr->GetEmptyTexture( "lowres_diffuse",
00312                 LOWRES_TEXTURE_WIDTH, LOWRES_TEXTURE_HEIGHT, GrTextureBase::EF_DXT5, kTexFlags, false );
00313         _lowResSpecular = ( GrTexture* )( GrTextureBase* )gGrTextureMgr->GetEmptyTexture( "lowres_specular",
00314                 LOWRES_TEXTURE_WIDTH, LOWRES_TEXTURE_HEIGHT, GrTextureBase::EF_DXT5, kTexFlags, false );
00315 
00317         _detailAtlas = ( GrTexture* )( GrTextureBase* )gGrTextureMgr->GetEmptyTexture( "ubertex_atlas",
00318                 DETAIL_ATLAS_WIDTH, DETAIL_ATLAS_HEIGHT, GrTextureBase::EF_RG16, kTexFlags, false );
00319 }
00320 
00321 //----------------------------------------------------------
00322 void
00323 GrUberTexture::WriteAtlas( unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int width, unsigned int height,
00324                                                    unsigned char cacheX, unsigned int cacheY )
00325 {
00327         unsigned int patchX = x / GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY;
00328         unsigned int patchY = y / GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY;
00329         unsigned int patchEndX = ( x + width + GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY - 1 ) / GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY;
00330         unsigned int patchEndY = ( y + height + GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY - 1 ) / GR_UBERTEX_PATCH_BOUNDARY;
00331 
00333         if ( _atlasEraseCount < 4096 )
00334         {
00335                 SAtlasErase& curEntry = _atlasEraseQueue[ _atlasEraseCount ];
00336                 curEntry.x = patchX;
00337                 curEntry.y = patchY;
00338                 curEntry.endX = patchEndX;
00339                 curEntry.endY = patchEndY;
00340 
00342                 _atlasEraseCount += 1;
00343         }
00344         else
00345                 _atlasEraseCount = ~0;
00346 
00348         unsigned char* atlasMem = _detailAtlasMem;
00349         for ( ; patchY < patchEndY; ++patchY )
00350         {
00351                 for ( ; patchX < patchEndX; ++patchX )
00352                 {
00354                         unsigned char* atlasPel = DETAIL_ATLAS_ADDR( atlasMem, patchX, patchY );
00355 
00357                         atlasPel[ 0 ] = cacheX;
00358                         atlasPel[ 1 ] = cacheY;
00359                 }
00360         }
00361 }
